name: Block Brigade
description:
Submission for the UTD SGDA Fall 2021 Game Jam.

Synopsis

Take your brigade of blocks one at a time to defeat enemies, progress through rooms, and open up shortcuts. When one dies, the body left behind might just be the deciding factor to claiming victory the next time around.

Your controls

The controls are best left to finding out through experimentation in the game, but if you are finding yourself stuck or are not familiar with games as a whole:

W A S D keys to move.

Aim your weapon with the mouse, left click to shoot.

Spacebar to jump

X to instantly die

E to trigger bomb (requires max graze)

Third-party Assets

Fog of War Gun Sound FX Free - Into the Void Sound Design
